footer.headline: Usul - the world's largest Islamic library
footer.description: Usul.ai serves over 8,000 Islamic texts from the OpenITI corpus. Our goal is to make it easy to read, search, and research classical texts. Subscribe below to receive monthly updates on our work.
footer.copyright: {year, number, nogroup} Seemorg Foundation. All rights reserved.
